monitor

Class MonitorAlert

  • java.lang.Object
    • monitor.MonitorAlert

  • public class MonitorAlert
extends java.lang.Object
    MonitorAlert is performing the alerts on a website. It is computing very second whether the app should raise an alert.
    Author:
    gabriellerappaport

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  MonitorAlert.TimerListener
      The TimerListener is called every second by the timer and launch the alert method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CheckDao checkDao
      CheckDao - link to the data tier to retrieve the availability
      private java.lang.Boolean flagUp
      flagUp - true if the availability > 0,8
      private java.lang.Integer period
      period - We need to compute the availability over the last x minutes
      private javax.swing.Timer timer
      Timer - call alert method every second
      private Website website
      website - the website we generate the alerts on
      private WebsiteDao websiteDao
      WebsiteDao - link to the data tier to check whether the website is still in the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MonitorAlert(Website website, java.lang.Integer period, java.lang.Boolean flagUp)
      Constructor of Monitor Alert When called, the timer is set to 1 second

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • MonitorAlert

        public MonitorAlert(Website website,
                    java.lang.Integer period,
                    java.lang.Boolean flagUp)
        Constructor of Monitor Alert When called, the timer is set to 1 second
        Parameters:
        website - - website we generate the alerts on
        period - - compute the availability over the last x minutes
        flagUp - - true if the availability > 0,8

    • Method Detail

      • alert

        private java.lang.Boolean alert(java.lang.Boolean flagUp)
        First, the alert method checks if the website is still in the database, if not, the timer is stopped. Then , the alert method retrieve the availability from the data tier. If the flapUp was true, it checks if during the last period, the availability <0,8 :
        • If the availability <0,8, it prints the alert and set flagUp to false
        • otherwise, it does nothing
        If the flapUp was false (thus an alert has been raised) it checks if during the last period, the availability > 0,8 :
        • If the availability > 0,8, it prints the end of the alert and set flagUp to true
        • otherwise, it does nothing
        Parameters:
        flagUp -
        Returns:
        true if the availability > 0,8, false otherwise
